footer.description: A collective curation platform for YouTube videos. Preserving and discovering valuable content together.

hero.description: A community dedicated to preserving and sharing the best YouTube videos. Old tutorials, traditional recipes, iconic memes, and more.
hero.submitUrlPlaceholder: Paste a YouTube video URL here...

error.notYoutubeUrl: Only YouTube video URLs are accepted.
error.emptyUrl: Please paste a YouTube video URL.

auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.hasAccount: Already have an account? Log in
auth.termsAgreement: By continuing, you agree to the terms of use and privacy policy.

error.emailNotConfirmed: Please confirm your email before logging in
error.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
error.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
error.genericAuthError: An authentication error occurred. Please try again.

success.confirmEmail: Check your email to confirm your registration
success.checkEmailForReset: Check your inbox for the password reset link.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.description: Manage your account security and credentials
settings.profileLinkDescription: Looking to update your display name, avatar, or bio?

emailSection.title: Email Address
emailSection.description: Update your email address. A confirmation will be sent to your new email.
emailSection.changeInfo: You will receive a confirmation link at your new email address. The change will take effect after you confirm.

passwordSection.title: Password
passwordSection.description: Change your password to keep your account secure.

success.emailUpdated: Email update request sent. Check your new email for confirmation.

error.samePassword: New password must be different from current
error.sameEmail: New email is the same as your current email
error.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to access account settings

resendEmail.title: Email Confirmation
resendEmail.description: Resend confirmation email if you haven't received it or need a new one.
resendEmail.notConfirmedWarning: Your email is not confirmed yet. Some features may be limited until you confirm your email.
resendEmail.cooldownMessage: Please wait a minute before requesting another email.

success.checkInbox: Check your inbox for the confirmation link.

error.cooldown: Please wait before requesting another email

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: Irreversible actions that permanently affect your account.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.
deleteAccount.warning: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.

consequences.title: What will be deleted:
consequences.irreversible: This action is permanent and irreversible

dialog.title: Wait! Are you really sure? ðŸ¥º

dialog.finalWarning: Last chance! This will permanently delete everything.

success.goodbye: We're sorry to see you go. Goodbye! ðŸ‘‹

submit.title: Submit Video
submit.description: Share an interesting YouTube video with the community
submit.previewPlaceholder: Paste a YouTube URL to see the preview
submit.tip1: Unique and interesting videos are more valued
submit.tip2: Choose the correct category to facilitate discovery
submit.tip3: Add a description explaining why the video is special

error.invalidUrlDescription: Please enter a valid YouTube URL
error.notLoggedInDescription: You need to be logged in to submit videos
error.videoExistsDescription: This video has already been submitted by another user
error.genericSubmitDescription: An error occurred while submitting the video. Please try again.
error.aiEnrichmentFailedDescription: Failed to start AI enrichment for the video.

success.videoSubmittedDescription: Your video has been successfully added to the collection

info.aiEnrichmentStartedDescription: AI is now processing video metadata for enrichment.

videos.title: Explore Videos
videos.description: Find videos by search, category, or language.
videos.noVideosFound: No videos found with the search criteria.

videoDetails.videoNotFoundDescription: The video you are looking for may not exist or have been removed.
videoDetails.noDescription: No description provided for this video.
videoDetails.favoriteInfo: You need to be logged in to favorite videos.

index.noRecentVideos: No recent videos yet. Be the first to submit!
index.ctaTitle: Know a video that deserves to be preserved?
index.ctaDescription: Share with the community and help build the largest archive of valuable videos on the internet.
index.playlistsDescription: Learning paths and collections created by the community
index.noPlaylistsDescription: Be the first to create a playlist and organize knowledge!
index.noCategoriesFound: No categories found. Please check back later!
index.communitySpotlightDescription: Meet our top curators and contributors
index.noContributorsFound: No top contributors found yet. Be the first to submit a video!

community.title: Community
community.description: Connect with other curators and video enthusiasts.
community.loadUsersError: Failed to load community users. Please try again later.
community.noUsersFoundDescription: It looks like there are no users in the community yet. Be the first to join!

playlists.title: Playlists
playlists.description: Curated learning paths and video collections.
playlists.noPlaylistsDescription: Be the first to create a playlist and organize knowledge!
playlists.loadingErrorDescription: Could not load playlists. Please try again later.

import.title: Import YouTube Playlist
import.description: Paste a YouTube playlist URL to import it as a new playlist, including all its videos.

error.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid YouTube playlist URL.
error.notYoutubePlaylistUrl: Only YouTube playlist URLs are accepted.
error.nameMinLength: Playlist name must be at least 3 characters.
error.notLoggedIn: You need to be logged in to import playlists.
error.noPlaylistId: Could not extract a playlist ID from the provided URL.
error.generic: An error occurred during playlist import. Please try again.
error.maxRetriesReached: Failed to create playlist after multiple attempts due to a slug conflict. Please try a different playlist name.
error.youtubeApiFetchFailed: Failed to fetch playlist details from YouTube. Please check the URL or try again later.
error.youtubeApiKeyMissing: YouTube API key is missing or invalid on the server. Please contact support.

success.allVideosProcessed: Successfully imported {{count}} videos into the playlist.

info.videoAlreadyExists: Video '{{title}}' already exists in Monynha Fun. Skipping creation.

warning.noVideosFoundInPlaylist: No videos found in the YouTube playlist. An empty playlist will be created.

import.apiLimitationInfo: Monynha Fun uses a backend service to fetch YouTube playlist videos, but depends on the YouTube Data API which has quotas and may not always return all videos for very large playlists. For optimal results, ensure the playlist is public.

playlistDetails.notFoundDescription: The playlist you are looking for may not exist or have been removed.
playlistDetails.noDescription: No description provided for this playlist.
playlistDetails.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the '{{playlistName}}' playlist and all its associated videos.
playlistDetails.privateDescription: This playlist is private and can only be viewed by its author or collaborators.
playlistDetails.noVideosTitle: No videos in this playlist yet.
playlistDetails.noVideosDescription: Add videos to start building your learning path!
playlistDetails.videosLoadErrorDescription: Could not load videos for this playlist. Please try again later.
playlistDetails.addVideoDialogDescription: Search and select videos to add to this playlist.

collaborators.title: Playlist Collaborators
collaborators.description: Manage who can view and edit this playlist.

createEditPlaylist.createDescription: Organize videos into coherent learning paths or collections.
createEditPlaylist.editDescription: Update the details of your playlist.
createEditPlaylist.loadErrorDescription: Could not load playlist details. Please try again later.

form.slugHint: A unique identifier for the URL (lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only).
form.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of what this playlist covers.
form.thumbnailUrlHint: Direct link to a custom image for your playlist. If empty, the first video's thumbnail will be used.
form.courseCodeHint: The course code this playlist belongs to (optional).
form.unitCodeHint: The unit code within the course (optional).
form.isPublicHint: Public playlists are visible to all users.
form.learningPathHint: Videos are ordered and meant to be followed sequentially. FACODI fields will appear if selected. For more information, visit FACODI.pt.
form.collectionHint: Videos are a curated set, order is not strictly enforced.
form.facodiFieldsDescription: These fields are for playlists that are part of a structured FACODI course.

error.nameMinLength: Playlist name must be at least 3 characters
error.slugMinLength: Slug must be at least 3 characters
error.slugInvalidFormat: Slug must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
error.notLoggedInDescription: You need to be logged in to create or edit playlists.
